Detailed Description

This abstract base class provides an interface for a classification dataset, i.e. a set of samples that represents different characteristics of previously recognized characters. A sample is composed of two fields: a feature vector and its code. The code is a numeric identifier that indicates the class where the feature vector belongs to. Any sample in the dataset can be read, and adding or deleting samples is also supported.

See also:
FeatureVector

Postcondition:
